metadata.name: Content Editing
metadata.description: Evaluates writer agent's ability to edit and improve existing text

testCase.userPrompt:
Please edit this paragraph to make it clearer and more concise:

"Our company is really very committed to providing the best possible customer service experience to all of our valued customers. We believe that customer satisfaction is extremely important and we will always try our best to make sure that every single customer is completely happy with their purchase and the service they receive from us."

requiredElements.value: maintains or improves the core message while simplifying
keeps the customer service commitment message

optionalElements.value: describes what was changed and why
